sentence: Billionaire Peter Thiel hosted about two dozen Republican donors at his 10,000-square-foot Miami compound on Wednesday night to raise money for Wyoming Republican Harriet Hageman, the Donald Trumpbacked candidate running a primary challenge against GOP representative Liz Cheney.
author: Gabriel Sherman
title: It Was All About How the 2020 Election Was Stolen: Billionaire Peter Thiel Hosts Fundraiser for Liz Cheney Challenger

sentence: Cheney, one of the most prominent GOP critics of former President Trump, is preparing to face a number of primary challengers, including Harriet Hageman, who is supported by Trump.

title: Cheney breaks her quarterly fundraising record while facing Trump-backed primary challenge

sentence: Cheney's team also criticized a separate deal struck by Wyoming GOP chairman Frank Eathorne and the national party that would enable the RNC to fund Cheney's primary challenger, Harriet Hageman, using a longstanding party rule known as Rule 11.
